name: PleasantWood
description: In a small town in West Virginia a murder has taken place!  Use various clues and evidence to find who or what the killer is.  PleasantWood is made to run on any Gameboy emulator, as well as on calculators using TI-boy CE.  It was also made using GBStudio 2.  It can be played in browser or download the ROM to play in other ways.  Remember, this is just a demo, feel free to list criticism in the comments!
